name: Apex Tower
description:
A little Fantasy FPS Tower Defense made in 48 hours for the first JimJam! (4/6/2018 - 4/9/2018)

Developed by:

- Carlos "Zactar" Gasperin

- Gabriel "The Scarecrow" Dall'Alba

- Leonardo "Pixel" Lima

Controls:

Movement = A S D W

mouse left click = shoot

Space = jump

Q and mouse right click = Special attacks

Disclaimer 1: There is a bug in which if you die and restart the game the boss will not spawn anymore (it should spawn for the first time when you pass 500 points). It happened in a few tests but we couldn't replicate it consistently, so we don't know what's causing it. If it happens to you, close the game and open it again and it should solve this problem.

Disclaimer 2: The text in the intro screens are on low resolution (a small mistake), this will be fixed on future builds .
